events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position this morning, expressing strong interest in DevOps and backend development roles.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster due to keywords including software engineer, developer, and DevOps experience.
A recruiter familiar with engineering hires has been assigned to the candidate to ensure a smooth and relevant recruitment process focused on software and DevOps skills.
Conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidateâ€™s experience with software development, particularly their recent projects involving cloud infrastructure and automation.
The candidate responded promptly, confirming their availability for a technical interview and expressing enthusiasm about the opportunity to work in DevOps.
Scheduled a technical interview for the candidate with the engineering team to further evaluate their coding skills and knowledge of DevOps tools and best practices.
